compoundScale.name: Compound Scale
compoundScale.description: Play the scale in the specified pattern. Helps you become familiar with scale

compingRhythms1.name: Four Comping Rhythms
compingRhythms1.description: Basic 1-bar comping rhythms. The exercise should be done both in swing and in straight eights. Bass should be alternated between quarters and halves.

251BasicImprov.name: II-V-I improvisation exercise
251BasicImprov.description: Improvise on a 2-5-1 progression from a limited set of notes, with the relevant pattern

251Singing.name: II-V-I singing exercise
251Singing.description: Being able to sing what you improvise is an important milestone. Sing from the restricted set of notes of each chord. Start with simple rhythmic patterns

quartersSwingFeel.name: Quarters Swing Feel
quartersSwingFeel.description: Practice swing feeling, play each quarter as leading to the following one. Peak is on first beat.

251Voicings.name: II-V-I Chords and Voicings
251Voicings.description: Practice different voicings and rhythms over the II-V-I harmonic progression. Left hand plays root on down beats.
